exceptions module¶

All custom error exceptions in the project are here They inherit from a base class MyProjectError(Exception)

exception exceptions.BadEpochType(epoch_type)¶

Bases: MyProjectError

A bad type of time epoch’

exception exceptions.FolderNotEmpty(folder_name)¶

Bases: MyProjectError

Raise at a non-empty folder deleting request. It returns an appropriate error message

exception exceptions.FolderNotExist(folder_name)¶

Bases: MyProjectError

Raise if named folder doesn’t exist in the common dict of nodes. It returns an appropriate error message

exception exceptions.MyProjectError¶

Bases: Exception

A base class for my project exceptions

exception exceptions.NodeNotExists(node_name)¶

Bases: MyProjectError

Raise if named node doesn’t exist in the common dict of nodes. It returns an appropriate error message

Bookmark manager (a learning project)
